Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-25710 affecting package javapackages-bootstrap for versions less than 1.14.0-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-25710 affecting package javapackages-bootstrap for versions less than 1.14.0-2. A patched version of the package is available.
